parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID of the farm in the job.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The queue ID associated with the job.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The job ID.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the job.

nested_items.name: lifecycleStatus
nested_items.description: The life cycle status for the job.

nested_items.name: lifecycleStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message that communicates the status of the life cycle for the job.

nested_items.name: priority
nested_items.description: The job priority.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that created this resource.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that updated this resource.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource started running.

nested_items.name: endedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource ended running.

nested_items.name: taskRunStatus
nested_items.description: The task run status for the job.

nested_items.name: targetTaskRunStatus
nested_items.description: The task status with which the job started.

nested_items.name: taskRunStatusCounts
nested_items.description: The number of tasks running on the job.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: storageProfileId
nested_items.description: The storage profile ID associated with the job.

nested_items.name: maxFailedTasksCount
nested_items.description: The number of task failures before the job stops running and is marked as FAILED.

nested_items.name: maxRetriesPerTask
nested_items.description: The maximum number of retries per failed tasks.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters for the job.

nested_items.name: int
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: int
nested_items.description: A signed integer represented as a string.

nested_items.name: float
nested_items.description: A double precision IEEE-754 floating point number represented as a string.

nested_items.name: string
nested_items.description: A UTF-8 string.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: A file system path represented as a string.

nested_items.name: attachments
nested_items.description: The attachments for the job.

nested_items.name: manifests
nested_items.description: A list of manifests which describe job attachment configurations.

nested_items.name: fileSystemLocationName
nested_items.description: The file system location name.

nested_items.name: rootPath
nested_items.description: The file's root path.

nested_items.name: rootPathFormat
nested_items.description: The format of the root path.

nested_items.name: outputRelativeDirectories
nested_items.description: The file path relative to the directory.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: inputManifestPath
nested_items.description: The file path.

nested_items.name: inputManifestHash
nested_items.description: The hash value of the file.

nested_items.name: fileSystem
nested_items.description: The file system.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the job.

nested_items.name: maxWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The maximum number of worker hosts that can concurrently process a job. When the maxWorkerCount is reached, no more workers will be assigned to process the job, even if the fleets assigned to the job's queue has available workers.

nested_items.name: sourceJobId
nested_items.description: The job ID for the source job.
